title: Didnt get my star guardian ezreal skin
body: my friend send me a star guardian ezreal on 9/7, and it is view-able in gifting history, I didn't play him since yesterday, when I am trying to use him with the new skin, I find out it is not use-able, and in store it says I didn't buy that skin, and i checked gifting history multiple times, it did shows that my friend send me the skin that day, what's going on??????

replies.body: It looks like the account that sent you that skin might have been compromised when the skin was sent. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing agents can take a look over what happened and set things right if needed.
